Name: Resilient Population
Description: You may play this card between the infect and intensify steps of an epidemic. Remove any 1 card from the infection discard pile from the game.

Name: Government Grant
Description: Add 1 research station to any city. Play any time.

Name: Airlift
Description: Move any 1 pawn to any city. Permission must be requested before moving another player's pawn.

Name: One Quiet Night
Description: Skip the next infect cities step. (Do not flip over any infection cards)

Name: Forecast
column5: and rearrange the top 6 cards of the infection deck. Put them back on top.
